greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: (9,11) Pascal triangle.
comment: Sums of NW-SE diagonals give A022114 (apart from first two terms).
Triangle T(n,k), read by rows, given by (9,-8,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,...) DELTA (11,-10,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,...) where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 09 2011
Row n: Expansion of (9+11x)*(1+x)^(n-1), n > 0. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 09 2011
results.author: _Mark Dols_, Jan 28 2010
ext: Corrected and extended by _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 09 2011
